title: FBI's Hart on Cyber Threats: Companies Are Not Prepared (Audio)
itunes:title: FBI's Hart on Cyber Threats: Companies Are Not Prepared (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Arlette Hart, Federal Bureau of Investigation’s Chief Information Security Officer, on how companies can protect themselves from data breaches. Broadcasting Live from the Bloomberg Breakaway Summit in NYC.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
